achievements.name: Know any campfire songs?
achievements.description: Consume at least 40 wood by burning it.

achievements.name: Don't underestimate Plant Fuel
achievements.description: Consume at least 100 Plant Fuel by burning it.

achievements.name: Nice Surprise 1
achievements.description: Obtain at least 100 Titanium Ore by collecting Stone.

achievements.name: Nice Surprise 2
achievements.description: Obtain at least 100 Silicon Ore by collecting Stone.

achievements.name: Nice Surprise 3
achievements.description: Obtain at least 100 Organic Crystals by collecting plants.

achievements.name: Nice Surprise 4
achievements.description: Obtain at least 100 Sulfuric Acid by collecting plants.

achievements.name: Nice Surprise 5
achievements.description: Obtain at least 10 Carbon Nanotubes by collecting plants.

achievements.name: Chemist
achievements.description: Make 20 Organic Crystals by hand using the original formula.

achievements.name: Blackbox designer
achievements.description: Copy and save a Blueprint.

achievements.name: I'm gonna need more drones!
achievements.description: Control 10 or more Construction Drones.

achievements.name: Sail away with me
achievements.description: Unlock upgrade to make the Solar Sail last 2 hours.

achievements.name: Who approved this?
achievements.description: Unlock technology to make the construction latitude of the Dyson Sphere node reach 45 degrees.

achievements.name: Light-footed
achievements.description: Unlock upgrade to make mecha reach 12m/s movement speed.

achievements.name: Employee of the month
achievements.description: Unlock upgrade to allow Pile Sorters to load and unload cargos simultaneously.

achievements.name: Magpie
achievements.description: Discover 7 kinds of rare minerals, and collect at least 10 by hand.

achievements.name: Space invaders
achievements.description: Use the mineral burial function to bury at least 20 Veins.

achievements.name: Mineral field depleted
achievements.description: Deplete 1 Vein.

achievements.name: Minerals by the dozen
achievements.description: Cover at least 12 Veins with one Mining machine.

achievements.name: Slip 'n' slide
achievements.description: Fill 10 tanks of fluid in a game.

achievements.name: Now Boarding
achievements.description: Have at least 100 Logistics Drones for a planet in transit.

achievements.name: Interstellar convoy
achievements.description: Have at least 50 Interstellar Logistics Vessels in space.

achievements.name: Forgot about that
achievements.description: Build Wind Turbines on a planet with no atmosphere.

achievements.name: High-rise
achievements.description: Build a building at least 7 stories tall.

achievements.name: Determination
achievements.description: Use more than 80K foundations on a Waterworld planet.

achievements.name: Don't sand so close to me
achievements.description: Collect at least 4M units of sand in a game.

achievements.name: I saw this in a movie once
achievements.description: Cover a planet with a Foundation.

achievements.name: Tickets please!
achievements.description: Establish an Interstellar Logistics Transportation line.

achievements.name: Intergalactic logistics
achievements.description: Establish 5 Interstellar Logistics Transportation lines between different planetary systems.

achievements.name: Low battery
achievements.description: Have Icarusâ€™ energy below 5% for more than 3 minutes when on the ground.

achievements.name: Space junk
achievements.description: Exhaust both fuel and energy while flying in space.

achievements.name: Running on fumes
achievements.description: Manually collect 20 Hydrogen with Icarus on a Gas Giant while energy is at 5% or less.

achievements.name: No diving!
achievements.description: Have a mecha run out of energy and fall into water.

achievements.name: Power surge
achievements.description: Use 12 Wireless Power Towers to charge a mecha at the same time.

achievements.name: Burn baby burn
achievements.description: Have Icarus burn at least 16 different fuels in a game.

achievements.name: I can see my house from here!
achievements.description: Get Icarus 40m above sea level without entering flight mode.

achievements.name: Sonic boom!
achievements.description: Exceed a sailing speed of 340m/s in the atmosphere.

achievements.name: Faster than light
achievements.description: Reach a sailing speed of 3000m/s in non-warp transportation.

achievements.name: My planet, my rules!
achievements.description: Name a planet.

achievements.name: One giant leap for mankind!
achievements.description: Leave the original planet and land on another within an hour.

achievements.name: Where no coal has gone before
achievements.description: Use coal as the only fuel to move from one planet to another.

achievements.name: Only impossible until it's not
achievements.description: Start warp engine.

achievements.name: Before our time
achievements.description: Land on another planet outside the initial planetary system before unlocking Warp drive.

achievements.name: Planet Explorer I
achievements.description: Land on 5 different planets!

achievements.name: Planet Explorer II
achievements.description: Land on 15 different planets!

achievements.name: What time is it?
achievements.description: Find and land on a planet with day and night tidal locking.

achievements.name: I'm not tilted
achievements.description: Find and land on a planet rotating on a horizontal axis.

achievements.name: The sun rises in the...West?
achievements.description: Find and land on a planet rotating on a reverse axis.

achievements.name: Are you proud of me, Stephen?
achievements.description: Find and orbit a Black Hole.

achievements.name: Boy genius
achievements.description: Find and orbit a Neutron Star.

achievements.name: Bon voyage!
achievements.description: Travel to the planetary system farthest from your original system.

achievements.name: Well traveled
achievements.description: Travel to at least 32 planetary systems in a game.

achievements.name: Let there be light!
achievements.description: Light an Artificial Star on the North and South Pole of the original planet, an Ice Field Gelisol Planet, and the eternal night side of a tide-locked planet.

achievements.name: Lean mean cleaning machine
achievements.description: Use Icarus' garbage clearing function to absorb 50,000 units of Iron Ingot at the same time.

achievements.name: Environmental nightmare
achievements.description: Drop 3000 units of Titanium Ingot at once while flying through space.

achievements.name: Build it and they will come
achievements.description: Build 10 Orbital Collectors.

achievements.name: Maximum efficiency
achievements.description: Build and maintain 100 Ray Receivers with a receiving efficiency of over 85%.

achievements.name: Data rules everything around me
achievements.description: Achieve a Matrix Lab upload rate of 1M hash/s.

achievements.name: Firing on all cylinders
achievements.description: Unlock upgrade to decrease the mineral mining consumption rate to less than 15%.

achievements.name: Memento!
achievements.description: Don't dismantle the landing capsule before completing the game.

achievements.name: Icarus, PhD
achievements.description: Unlock all technologies (upgrade Unlimited Technology at least once).

achievements.name: Mission accomplished
achievements.description: Complete the game.

achievements.name: x0.5 Resource completion
achievements.description: Complete the game on x0.5 resource difficulty.

achievements.name: Didn't break a sweat!
achievements.description: Complete the game within 25 hours on x1 (or less) resource difficulty.

achievements.name: Mission impossible!
achievements.description: Complete the game within 10 hours on x1 (or less) resource difficulty.

achievements.name: Solar Sail? No thank you!
achievements.description: Complete the game without launching a Solar Sail.

achievements.name: Environmentalist
achievements.description: Complete the game without using Foundations.

achievements.name: Alien Mineral Protection Act
achievements.description: Complete the game without gathering rare veins to obtain rare ores.

achievements.name: Bullseye
achievements.description: Launch a total of 100K Solar Sails.

achievements.name: We have lift-off
achievements.description: Launch a total of 30,000 Small Carrier Rockets.

achievements.name: Critical thinker
achievements.description: Produce a total of 60,000 Critical Photons.

achievements.name: Secrets of the universe I
achievements.description: Upload a total of 1M Universe matrices.

achievements.name: Secrets of the universe II
achievements.description: Upload a total of 10M Universe matrices.

achievements.name: Got Deuterium?
achievements.description: Use Fractionators to produce at least 100K Deuterium per hour on a single planet.

achievements.name: Green power
achievements.description: Produce at least 43,200 Electromagnetic turbines per hour.

achievements.name: Electromagnetic matrix
achievements.description: Produce at least 43,200 Electromagnetic matrices per hour.

achievements.name: Energy matrix
achievements.description: Produce at least 43,200 Energy matrices per hour.

achievements.name: Structure matrix
achievements.description: Produce at least 43,200 Structure matrices per hour.

achievements.name: Information matrix
achievements.description: Produce at least 43,200 Information matrices per hour.

achievements.name: Gravity matrix
achievements.description: Produce at least 43,200 Gravity matrices per hour.

achievements.name: Universe matrix, Yellow Belt
achievements.description: Produce at least 21,600 Universe matrices per hour.

achievements.name: Universe matrix, Green Belt
achievements.description: Produce at least 43,200 Universe matrices per hour.

achievements.name: Universe matrix, Blue Belt
achievements.description: Produce at least 108,000 Universe matrices per hour.

achievements.name: No coal? No problem!
achievements.description: Generate more than 60MW of electricity on a planet using Wind Turbines.

achievements.name: Sunbather
achievements.description: Generate more than 180MW of electricity on a planet using Solar Panels.

achievements.name: All systems are go!
achievements.description: Achieve discharge power of more than 300MW on a planet using Energy Hubs.

achievements.name: Going nuclear
achievements.description: Generate more than 600MW of power on a planet using Mini Fusion Power Plants.

achievements.name: Like a diamond in the sky
achievements.description: Light a star that belongs to you in the Milky Way View.

achievements.name: CentreBrain needs more energy I
achievements.description: Total power generation of the Dyson Sphere reaches 200MW.

achievements.name: CentreBrain needs more energy II
achievements.description: Total power generation of the Dyson Sphere reaches 1GW.

achievements.name: CentreBrain needs more energy III
achievements.description: Total power generation of the Dyson Sphere reaches 1TW.

achievements.name: We can make it if we try
achievements.description: Build a Dyson Sphere around a Red Giant star with a power generation performance of more than 10GW.

achievements.name: Backup plan
achievements.description: Build a Star Cluster with an energy storage capacity of 27GJ or more.

achievements.name: Small factory
achievements.description: Reach a total power generation of 20MW.

achievements.name: Medium factory
achievements.description: Reach a total power generation of 100MW.

achievements.name: Large factory
achievements.description: Reach a total power generation of 1GW.

achievements.name: Giant factory
achievements.description: Reach a total power generation of 5GW.

achievements.name: Universe factory
achievements.description: Reach a total power generation of 50GW.

achievements.name: Infinite Factory I
achievements.description: Exceed a total energy consumption of 1GJ.

achievements.name: Infinite Factory II
achievements.description: Exceed a total energy consumption of 1TJ.

achievements.name: Infinite Factory III
achievements.description: Exceed a total energy consumption of 1PJ.

achievements.name: Dust to dust I
achievements.description: Collect 1M soil piles from Dark Fog.

achievements.name: Dust to dust II
achievements.description: Collect 10M soil piles from Dark Fog.

achievements.name: Dust to dust III
achievements.description: Collect 100M soil piles from Dark Fog.

achievements.name: Happy Hunting I
achievements.description: Neutralize 100 Dark Fog space units.

achievements.name: Happy Hunting II
achievements.description: Neutralize 1000 Dark Fog space units.

achievements.name: Happy Hunting III
achievements.description: Neutralize 10000 Dark Fog space units.

achievements.name: Bullet Storm
achievements.description: Bullet consumption reaches 360/min on any planet.

achievements.name: A Penny Saved
achievements.description: Complete the mission without any buildings destroyed at Difficulty 1.0 or above.

achievements.name: Strangle in the cradle
achievements.description: Wipe out a Dark Fog Planetary Base within 1 hour at Difficulty 1.0 or above.

achievements.name: Peace & Love
achievements.description: Complete the mission without any Dark Fog buildings neutralized at Difficulty 1.0 or above.

achievements.name: In the Spotlight
achievements.description: Have 40 Laser Towers shoot the same target at Difficulty 1.0 or above.

achievements.name: War has Changed
achievements.description: Complete the mission without building any Turrets at Difficulty 1.0 or above.

achievements.name: Won't Lie Low
achievements.description: Attract an attack from a space unit within 1 hour at Difficulty 1.0 or above.

achievements.name: Monster Kill
achievements.description: Icarus neutralizes over 1,000 Dark Fog units within 1 minute.

achievements.name: POPCORN!
achievements.description: Implosion Cannon neutralizes 40 enemies or more with 1 shot.

achievements.name: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
achievements.description: Keep Icarus' energy shield's power consumption at 1GW while resisting damage for over 1 minute.

achievements.name: Invincible
achievements.description: Base radius of Icarus' Energy Shield reaches 25m.

achievements.name: A.T Field
achievements.description: Planetary Shield's coverage reaches 100% over a planet.

achievements.name: Super Nova!
achievements.description: Activate Supernova.

achievements.name: Shoot Oneself in the Foot
achievements.description: Lure Lancers to destroy a Planetary Base.

achievements.name: You Started It
achievements.description: Have Icarus destroyed by Dark Fog at Passive Dark Fog aggressiveness.

achievements.name: Right Under My Nose
achievements.description: Land on a planet that is 8000m or closer to a Dark Fog Hive.

achievements.name: You Shall Not Pass!
achievements.description: Neutralize a Relay Station before it lands on a planet.

achievements.name: Global Offense
achievements.description: Be simultaneously assaulted by 12 Planetary Bases on a planet.

achievements.name: Wrong Place
achievements.description: Land on a planet occupied by over 20 Planetary Bases.

achievements.name: Gotcha
achievements.description: Find Dark Fog Communicator.

achievements.name: It's on Fire
achievements.description: Icarus' Replicator speed reaches 400%.

achievements.name: All Calculated
achievements.description: Unlock all secret technologies.
